title: Au Clair de Lune
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description:
Serves meat, veg options available. Simple, healthy and tasty organic food with 50% of the menu being Vegetarian and Vegan dishes. Most of the products are local and they make the desserts in-house. 
In spring and summer there are some tables outside in the restaurant's backyard.
